CompanyDescription: Shiloh Industries, Inc. and its subsidiaries (collectively referred to as the "Company," "Shiloh," "us," "our" or "we") is a Delaware corporation that was incorporated in 1993. We are a global innovative solutions provider focusing on lightweighting technologies that provide environmental and safety benefits to the mobility market. Shiloh, headquartered in Valley City, Ohio, has a global network of manufacturing operations and technical centers in Asia, Europe and North America. Our multi-component, multi-material solutions are comprised of a variety of alloys in aluminum, magnesium and steel grades, along with our proprietary line of noise and vibration reducing ShilohCore® acoustic laminate products.
